name: MayhemCars
description:
Description
Inspiration for this game was rather simple. Create racing game that could be played in as many ways possible with AI that is trying to do stupid things instead of trying to just win. Main goal is to have AI that will be decent but still unpredictable.
Features
Car reward system - 0-3 cars rewarded per match (based on score)Local and global multiplayer (TODO)Worldwide statistics - See best time and score for each track (TODO)40 cars as reward - (Prepared for up to 130 cars (TODO))
Controls
ws - increase, decrease speedad - turn your wheelsspace - brakemouse - menu navigation
